mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_password, u.role_id, u.role_name, a.authority_id, a.authority_name FROM user u LEFT JOIN role_authority rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN authority a ON rp.authority_id = a.authority_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_name, user_password, role_id, role_name, gmt_create) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{roleId}, (SELECT role_name FROM role WHERE role_id = #{roleId}), #{gmtCreate})
mapper.select: SELECT product_num FROM user u LEFT JOIN cart_item ci ON u.user_id = ci.user_id LEFT JOIN good g ON ci.product_id = g.product_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND g.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_item SET is_checked = #{checked}, gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_name = #{userName})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item (user_id, product_id, product_num, is_checked, gmt_create) VALUES ( (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_name = #{userName}), #{productId}, 1, 1, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT g.product_id, g.product_name, ci.product_num, g.product_image, g.sale_price, ci.is_checked FROM cart_item ci LEFT JOIN user u ON ci.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN good g ON ci.product_id = g.product_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName}
